original_title: André Rieu - Songs From My Heart
overview: Revisit André Rieu’s spectacular midsummer night concerts in the Vrijthof square by watching this fabulous DVD. With unique, spectacular light shows and unforgettable performances by our soloists Suzan, Carmen and Carla and the Platinum Tenors! And last but not least, a guest appearance from our very own, the one and only Benny Neyman from Maastricht!
title: André Rieu - Songs From My Heart
